SEARCH

Class User

java.lang.Object
User
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserActions
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Staff, Student
public class User extends Object implements UserActions
The User class represents a user in the system and implements the UserActions interface. It provides methods to manage user actions such as changing passwords, logging in, controling user login, retreiving user information, and logging out.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String userID, String password, String email, String faculty, boolean isLocked)
      The Constructors for a new user.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique userID.
      password - The password of this account.
      email - The email address of this user.
      faculty - The faculty this user is from.
      isLocked - A boolean indicating whether the account is locked.

      public void changePassword(String newPassword) throws UserException
      Changes the user's password to the specified new password.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface UserActions
      Parameters:
      newPassword - The new password to set to.
      Throws:
      UserException - If the user is not logged in.

    • login

      public boolean login(String password) throws UserException
      Authenticates the user by verifying the provided password.
      Specified by:
      login in interface UserActions
      Parameters:
      password - The password to verify.
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      UserException - If the user is locked, already logged in, or login attempts exceed the limit.
